Package de.bkroeger.editor4.controller

Class FileController

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.bkroeger.editor4.controller.BaseController
      • de.bkroeger.editor4.controller.FileController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IController
    @Component
@Scope("prototype")
public class FileController
extends BaseController
implements IController

    This controller manages the behaviour of a diagram file.

    A diagram file supports following actions:

      Select current page
    • Add a page
    • Remove a page
    • Edit page properties
    • Save file (invoked by menu)
    • Load file (invoked by menu)
    Author:
    bk

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  FileController.PageComparator
      This Comparator class compares two objects of type PageController and sorts them according to the page number.
